## [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)

### Methods

|                                                                     Method                                                                      |                                             Return type                                              |                                                                         Brief description                                                                          |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [addCheckboxGridItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addCheckboxGridItem())                                   | [CheckboxGridItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/checkbox-grid-item)     | Appends a new question item, presented as a grid of columns and rows, that allows the respondent to select multiple choices per row from a sequence of checkboxes. |
| [addCheckboxItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addCheckboxItem())                                           | [CheckboxItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/checkbox-item)              | Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to select one or more checkboxes, as well as an optional "other" field.                                     |
| [addDateItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addDateItem())                                                   | [DateItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/date-item)                      | Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to indicate a date.                                                                                         |
| [addDateTimeItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addDateTimeItem())                                           | [DateTimeItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/date-time-item)             | Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to indicate a date and time.                                                                                |
| [addDurationItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addDurationItem())                                           | [DurationItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/duration-item)              | Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to indicate a length of time.                                                                               |
| [addEditor(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addEditor(String))                                     | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Adds the given user to the list of editors for the [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                                         |
| [addEditor(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addEditor(User))                                               | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Adds the given user to the list of editors for the [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                                         |
| [addEditors(emailAddresses)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addEditors(String))                                 | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Adds the given array of users to the list of editors for the [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                               |
| [addGridItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addGridItem())                                                   | [GridItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/grid-item)                      | Appends a new question item, presented as a grid of columns and rows, that allows the respondent to select one choice per row from a sequence of radio buttons.    |
| [addImageItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addImageItem())                                                 | [ImageItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/image-item)                    | Appends a new layout item that displays an image.                                                                                                                  |
| [addListItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addListItem())                                                   | [ListItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/list-item)                      | Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to select one choice from a dropdown list.                                                                  |
| [addMultipleChoiceItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addMultipleChoiceItem())                               | [MultipleChoiceItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/multiple-choice-item) | Adds a new question item that allows the respondent to select one choice from a list of radio buttons or an optional "other" field.                                |
| [addPageBreakItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addPageBreakItem())                                         | [PageBreakItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item)           | Adds a new layout item that marks the start of a page.                                                                                                             |
| [addParagraphTextItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addParagraphTextItem())                                 | [ParagraphTextItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/paragraph-text-item)   | Adds a new question item that allows the respondent to enter a block of text.                                                                                      |
| [addPublishedReader(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addPublishedReader(String))                   | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Adds the given user to the list of responders for the [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                                      |
| [addPublishedReader(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addPublishedReader(User))                             | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Adds the given user to the list of responders for the [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                                      |
| [addPublishedReaders(emailAddresses)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addPublishedReaders(String))               | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Adds the given array of users to the list of responders for the [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                            |
| [addRatingItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addRatingItem())                                               | [RatingItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item)                  | Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to give a rating.                                                                                           |
| [addScaleItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addScaleItem())                                                 | [ScaleItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/scale-item)                    | Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to choose one option from a numbered sequence of radio buttons.                                             |
| [addSectionHeaderItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addSectionHeaderItem())                                 | [SectionHeaderItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)   | Appends a new layout item that visually indicates the start of a section.                                                                                          |
| [addTextItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addTextItem())                                                   | [TextItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/text-item)                      | Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to enter a single line of text.                                                                             |
| [addTimeItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addTimeItem())                                                   | [TimeItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/time-item)                      | Appends a new question item that allows the respondent to indicate a time of day.                                                                                  |
| [addVideoItem()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#addVideoItem())                                                 | [VideoItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/video-item)                    | Appends a new layout item that displays a video.                                                                                                                   |
| [canEditResponse()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#canEditResponse())                                           | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the form displays a link to edit a response after submitting it.                                                                                |
| [collectsEmail()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#collectsEmail())                                               | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the form collects respondents' email addresses.                                                                                                 |
| [createResponse()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#createResponse())                                             | [FormResponse](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form-response)              | Creates a new response to the form.                                                                                                                                |
| [deleteAllResponses()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#deleteAllResponses())                                     | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Deletes all submitted responses from the form's response store.                                                                                                    |
| [deleteItem(index)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#deleteItem(Integer))                                         | `void`                                                                                               | Deletes the item at a given index among all the items in the form.                                                                                                 |
| [deleteItem(item)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#deleteItem(Item))                                             | `void`                                                                                               | Deletes the given item.                                                                                                                                            |
| [deleteResponse(responseId)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#deleteResponse(String))                             | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Deletes a single response from the form's response store.                                                                                                          |
| [getConfirmationMessage()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getConfirmationMessage())                             | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the form's confirmation message.                                                                                                                              |
| [getCustomClosedFormMessage()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getCustomClosedFormMessage())                     | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the custom message that is displayed if the form is not accepting responses, or an empty string if no custom message is set.                                  |
| [getDescription()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getDescription())                                             | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the form's description.                                                                                                                                       |
| [getDestinationId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getDestinationId())                                         | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the ID of the form's response destination.                                                                                                                    |
| [getDestinationType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getDestinationType())                                     | [DestinationType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/destination-type)        | Gets the type of the form's response destination.                                                                                                                  |
| [getEditUrl()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getEditUrl())                                                     | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the URL that can be used to access the form's edit mode.                                                                                                      |
| [getEditors()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getEditors())                                                     | [User[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/base/user.html)                                   | Gets the list of editors for this [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                                                          |
| [getId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getId())                                                               | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the ID of the form.                                                                                                                                           |
| [getItemById(id)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getItemById(Integer))                                          | [Item](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item)                               | Gets the item with a given ID.                                                                                                                                     |
| [getItems()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getItems())                                                         | [Item[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item)                             | Gets an array of all items in the form.                                                                                                                            |
| [getItems(itemType)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getItems(ItemType))                                         | [Item[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item)                             | Gets an array of all items of a given type.                                                                                                                        |
| [getPublishedReaders()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getPublishedReaders())                                   | [User[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/base/user.html)                                   | Gets the list of responders for this [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                                                       |
| [getPublishedUrl()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getPublishedUrl())                                           | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the URL that can be used to respond to the form.                                                                                                              |
| [getResponse(responseId)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getResponse(String))                                   | [FormResponse](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form-response)              | Gets a single form response based on its response ID.                                                                                                              |
| [getResponses()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getResponses())                                                 | [FormResponse[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form-response)            | Gets an array of all of the form's responses.                                                                                                                      |
| [getResponses(timestamp)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getResponses(Date))                                    | [FormResponse[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form-response)            | Gets an array of all of the form's responses after a given date and time.                                                                                          |
| [getShuffleQuestions()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getShuffleQuestions())                                   | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the order of the questions on each page of the form is randomized.                                                                              |
| [getSummaryUrl()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getSummaryUrl())                                               | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the URL that can be used to view a summary of the form's responses.                                                                                           |
| [getTitle()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#getTitle())                                                         | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the form's title.                                                                                                                                             |
| [hasLimitOneResponsePerUser()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#hasLimitOneResponsePerUser())                     | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the form allows only one response per respondent.                                                                                               |
| [hasProgressBar()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#hasProgressBar())                                             | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the form displays a progress bar.                                                                                                               |
| [hasRespondAgainLink()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#hasRespondAgainLink())                                   | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the form displays a link to submit another response after a respondent completes the form.                                                      |
| [isAcceptingResponses()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#isAcceptingResponses())                                 | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the form is currently accepting responses.                                                                                                      |
| [isPublished()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#isPublished())                                                   | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the form is published.                                                                                                                          |
| [isPublishingSummary()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#isPublishingSummary())                                   | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the form displays a link to view a summary of responses after a respondent completes the form.                                                  |
| [isQuiz()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#isQuiz())                                                             | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the form is a quiz.                                                                                                                             |
| [moveItem(from, to)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#moveItem(Integer,Integer))                                  | [Item](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item)                               | Moves an item at a given index among all the items in the form to another given index.                                                                             |
| [moveItem(item, toIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#moveItem(Item,Integer))                                | [Item](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item)                               | Moves a given item to a given index among all the items in the form.                                                                                               |
| [removeDestination()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#removeDestination())                                       | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Unlinks the form from its current response destination.                                                                                                            |
| [removeEditor(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#removeEditor(String))                               | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Removes the given user from the list of editors for the [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                                    |
| [removeEditor(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#removeEditor(User))                                         | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Removes the given user from the list of editors for the [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                                    |
| [removePublishedReader(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#removePublishedReader(String))             | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Removes the given user from the list of responders for the [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                                 |
| [removePublishedReader(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#removePublishedReader(User))                       | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Removes the given user from the list of responders for the [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form).                                 |
| [setAcceptingResponses(enabled)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setAcceptingResponses(Boolean))                 | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets whether the form is currently accepting responses.                                                                                                            |
| [setAllowResponseEdits(enabled)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setAllowResponseEdits(Boolean))                 | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets whether the form displays a link to edit a response after submitting it.                                                                                      |
| [setCollectEmail(collect)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setCollectEmail(Boolean))                             | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets whether the form collects respondents' email addresses.                                                                                                       |
| [setConfirmationMessage(message)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setConfirmationMessage(String))                | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets the form's confirmation message.                                                                                                                              |
| [setCustomClosedFormMessage(message)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setCustomClosedFormMessage(String))        | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets the message to display if the form is not accepting responses.                                                                                                |
| [setDescription(description)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setDescription(String))                            | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets the form's description.                                                                                                                                       |
| [setDestination(type, id)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setDestination(DestinationType,String))               | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets the destination where form responses are saved.                                                                                                               |
| [setIsQuiz(enabled)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setIsQuiz(Boolean))                                         | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets whether the form is a quiz.                                                                                                                                   |
| [setLimitOneResponsePerUser(enabled)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setLimitOneResponsePerUser(Boolean))       | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets whether the form allows only one response per respondent.                                                                                                     |
| [setProgressBar(enabled)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setProgressBar(Boolean))                               | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets whether the form has a progress bar.                                                                                                                          |
| [setPublished(enabled)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setPublished(Boolean))                                   | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets whether the form is published.                                                                                                                                |
| [setPublishingSummary(enabled)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setPublishingSummary(Boolean))                   | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets whether the form displays a link to view a summary of responses after a respondent submits the form.                                                          |
| [setShowLinkToRespondAgain(enabled)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setShowLinkToRespondAgain(Boolean))         | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets whether the form displays a link to submit another response after a respondent completes the form.                                                            |
| [setShuffleQuestions(shuffle)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setShuffleQuestions(Boolean))                     | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets whether the order of the questions on each page of the form is randomized.                                                                                    |
| [setTitle(title)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#setTitle(String))                                              | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Sets the form's title.                                                                                                                                             |
| [shortenFormUrl(url)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#shortenFormUrl(String))                                    | `String`                                                                                             | Converts a long URL for a form to a short URL.                                                                                                                     |
| [submitGrades(responses)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#submitGrades(FormResponse))                            | [Form](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form)                               | Submits grades for the given FormResponses.                                                                                                                        |
| [supportsAdvancedResponderPermissions()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/form#supportsAdvancedResponderPermissions()) | `Boolean`                                                                                            | Determines whether the form supports publishing.                                                                                                                   |
